body.p: We the undersigned persons who tried & convicted Milton Crossley of rape at the April Term 1861 & sentenced him to confinement in the Ky penitentiary for ten years respectfully petition his Excellency the Governor of Kentucky to pardon him from further service -- We believe he has now fully expiated his guilt -- We indeed had a reasonable doubt of his guilt but thought a verdict of guilty demanded by the instructions of the court=
